shows.title: JFK Assassination Files / Conversations with God
shows.first_half: First Half: Investigative reporter Mark Shaw will bring us the evidence presented at the recent task force hearing dealing with newly released JFK files. According to Shaw, the revealed information sheds new light on the JFK assassination.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and researcher Neale Donald Walsch will discuss his 30 years of experiences while writing his ‘Conversations with God’ dialogue series. He'll share what he considers to be the 10 most life-changing messages he has received and the six-step process he uses in his research and writings.

shows.title: WWII Cover-Ups / Soul Frequencies & Healing
shows.first_half: First Half: Journalist and author Brian T. Brown will discuss the conspiracies and cover-ups that followed the first-ever nuclear explosion (the July 1945 Trinity Test). He'll examine Christopher Nolan’s "Oppenheimer" and make the case that it was not necessary to use atomic bombs on Japan.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Medical medium and spiritual teacher Kimberly Meredith will offer her unique blend of ancient teachings, quantum consciousness, and healing techniques. She'll demonstrate how she gets messages from the afterlife through her guides and also discuss angel numbers, soul frequencies, and energetic miracles.

shows.title: Cardio Health / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Natural health advocate John Hewlett, winner of the 2025 Product of the Year Award in Top Doctor Magazine, joins Connie Willis (info) in the first half. Known as "That Cardio Guy," Hewlett discusses his search, findings, and successes for non-invasive solutions for genetic and stress-related heart issues. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
